tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE costume_inventory (
    costume_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    costume_name VARCHAR(50),
    size VARCHAR(10),
    style VARCHAR(50),
    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE costume_inventory (
    costume_id INT,
    costume_name VARCHAR(255),
    size VARCHAR(50),
    style VARCHAR(50),
    availability BOOLEAN
);
CREATE TABLE costume_inventory (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  name VARCHAR(255),  size VARCHAR(10),  style VARCHAR(50),  availability BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE dance_styles (  id INT PRIMARY KEY,  style_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE );
CREATE TABLE performance_schedule (  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  performance_date DATE,  start_time TIME,  end_time TIME,  location VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE CostumeInventory ( costume_id INT PRIMARY KEY, costume_name VARCHAR(255), size VARCHAR(50), style VARCHAR(50), availability BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE DancePerformances ( performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, performance_name VARCHAR(255), date DATE, location VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE CostumeSizes ( size_id INT PRIMARY KEY, size_value VARCHAR(10), description VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE CostumeStyles ( style_id INT PRIMARY KEY, style_name VARCHAR(50), color VARCHAR(50), material VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE CostumeAvailability ( costume_id INT, size_id INT, style_id INT, available_quantity INT, FOREIGN KEY (costume_id) REFERENCES CostumeInventory(costume_id), FOREIGN KEY (size_id) REFERENCES CostumeSizes(size_id), FOREIGN KEY (style_id) REFERENCES CostumeStyles(style_id));
